page.description: Settings for defining the appearance of a Button in the FormView layout.

description.p: The *[ui:Button class]* property is used to define one or more classes for a button in the FormView layout. If you specify <Default> or an empty string, the default class for buttons is used. Specify <none> if you do not want any button class.
Multiple classes can be defined as a space delimited string. For example, you can specify both the default class and a custom class called *[css:mybuttonclass]* as follows:
Defines styles that will be applied in-line using the HTML *[html:style]* attribute for the button.
One or more classes applied to the button's text.
Defines styles that will be applied in-line using the HTML *[html:style]* attribute for the button's text.
One or more CSS classes applied to the button image. The *[ui:Image class]* property is not used if the image is a CSS icon.
Defines styles that will be applied in-line using the HTML *[html:style]* attribute for the image.The *[ui:Image inline style]* property is not used if the image is a CSS icon.
